relation: On May 19, 2015, the IceBridge BedMachine Greenland data were replaced by Version 2. Version 2 includes improved processing of some basins and adds some Operation IceBridge 2014 data. Heights are now provided with respect to mean sea level, instead of the WGS84 ellipsoid.The geoid is included in an additional field in the data.

textBeforeTable: IceBridge Accumulation Radar L1B Geolocated Radar Echo Strength Profiles (IRACC1B) NASA Operation IceBridge Data Products by Instrument ZLS Dynamic Gravity Meter Pressure Altimeter Products Position and Attitude Products Magnetometer Products Laser Altimeter Products High Capability Radar Sounder Products Gravimeter Products GPS / Inertial Measurement Unit Products University of Texas ICECAP Data Products By Instrument Sea Ice Freeboard, Snow Depth, and Thickness Derived Products UAF Lidar Snow Radar Sander/LDEO Airborne Gravimeter (AIRGrav) Position/Avionics (POS/AV) Pathfinder Advanced Radar Ice Sounder (PARIS) Multichannel Coherent Radar Depth Sounder (MCoRDS) Land, Vegetation, and Ice Sensor (LVIS) Ku-Band Radar Altimeter Digital Mapping System Camera (DMS) Continuous Airborne Mapping By Optical Translator (CAMBOT) Atmospheric Chemistry Airborne Topographic Mapper (ATM) Airborne Meteorological Instruments (AMET) Accumulation Radar NASA Operation IceBridge Data Products By Instrument "Fast track" indicates data sets published as soon as possible with minimal documentation, and full documentation to be provided later. Fast track data sets are V01. For Fast track data, any change is considered a minor version change.--> Minor version changes can include: change to processing algorithm, change to input, and change to output format
textAfterTable: V2.1 21 March 2013 to 25 April 2013 On 16 September 2014, Version 2 data were replaced by Version 2.1. A time stamp error was discovered in the 2013 Arctic campaign data. The latest leap second (July 1, 2012) was not accounted for in the GPS times for these campaigns. This error has been corrected in Version 2.1. IceBridge NSERC L1B Geolocated Meteorologic and Surface Temperature Data (IAMET1B) Version Dates Changes Included In This Version V1 12 October 2009 to present Initial release. IceBridge ATM L1B Elevation and Return Strength (ILATM1B) Version Dates Changes Included In This Version V1 31 March 2009 to 08 November 2012 Initial release. V2 30 March 2013 to present Beginning with the 2013 Arctic campaign, all data will be provided in HDF5 format. In the near future, qfit data from all campaigns prior to Spring 2013 will be replaced with HDF5 data. IceBridge ATM L2 Icessn Elevation, Slope, and Roughness (ILATM2) Version Dates Changes Included In This Version V1 31 March 2009 to 08 November 2012 Initial release.
